attributes.action: REJECT THE UNFAIR GARAGE RENT INCREASE BY MACCLESFIELD COUNCIL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MACCLESFIELD COUNCIL HAS SEEN FIT TO DOUBLE ITS GARAGE RENT CHARGE TO NON-RESIDENTS ONLY THIS UNFAIR  RISE IS WELL ABOVE THE RISE IN INFLATION AND IS SUPPOSED TO TAKE INTO ACCOUNT MAINTENANCE OF SAID GARAGES ANY PERSONS NOT PAYING IT WILL BE HOUNDED BY THE COUNCIL WETHER THEY BE OLD AGE PENSIONERS PEOPLE ON LOW INCOMES OR PEOPLE ON OTHER BENEFITS. THIS IS JUST ANOTHER EXAMPLE OF LOCAL GOVERMENTS  ACROSS THE COUNTRY WHO HAVE NO ACCOUNTABILITY TO THE VERY PEOPLE THAT THEY ARE SUPPOSED TO SERVE.

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
